info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 30 at 3:29AM MDT until March 31 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Snow accumulations between 3 and 7 inches at lower elevations, with 6 to 12 inches over higher terrain. * WHERE...Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains, Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft, Northwest Beaverhead County and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times. Those in the backcountry should ensure they are prepared for dangerous conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates may approach and exceed 1 inch per hour at times. Any wet or slushy road surfaces during the day will refreeze and become slippery this evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
